title: UI/UX Design & Wireframes
description:
Create comprehensive user interface mockups and wireframes for all main pages including:

• High-fidelity mockups for all pages (desktop and mobile)
• Interactive prototype using Figma or Adobe XD
• Complete design system documentation with colors, fonts, and components
• User flow diagrams for key processes
• Responsive design breakpoints defined
• Accessibility compliance checklist completed
• Final design files exported for development team
